Articles.Content: Greetings! Just recently bought the game  on x1and am enjoying it immensely! Although, does anyone know a good remedy for brain strain? Already had several failed missions due to angle of accent or fuel levels but this morning I managed to actually get into orbit while still having enough fuel for the decent! Lol, still have 1 Kerbalnaut stuck up there due to that miscalculation, I've noticed a bit of salt on this forum from some console users which, so far, I've seen no justification for, though I'd admit this game isn't for everyone. Personally, I look forward to spending many fun filled hours elevating my Kerbal to greatness....or possibly martyrdom
Welcome to the forums. Don't get caught up in the animosity.
Greetings Broke dead dogg.  Failure in KSP is only a ticket to more adventure.  The salt must be taken with some salt due to the problems with the console port.

Welcome, enjoy the game. Don't let others salt ruin your meal. 

Enjoy the victories!

Welcome to the fora! Fancy words! Yay!

Yeah, there has been a lot of console salt. I haven't played console yet, so I don't know how big of an issue the bugs are, but they seem serious.
I think the NaCI is mostly about certain people who are already a little salty about the mod thing getting a annoying progress-murder crash,
